Log In A global community of friends, artists and fans of music, film, and entertainment, united through a common culture, a common passion and through the desire to communicate and express ourselves at any time and place. You will be able to search for friends through their country, city, school, and even your own hood. View Download Free Sign Up! It’s a really cool music site where you can create your own custom play lists, connect with music fans and artists from around the world and listen to your favorite music for free! Here’s the link to join—it takes 30 seconds: http://www.cyloop.com/frontEnd/index.xhtml?language=en&invoke=nothing&xsl=registration.xsl PS: Check out my profile! www.cyloop.com/ Sunday Monday Tuesday Wednesday Thursday Friday Your mail has been sent In the Battle this week Your Songs Statistics of your songs in the Battle Zone Song Plays Rating Status Permanent Weeks in Battle Votes Ranking Control Dates in Battle Active Confirm your selection to compete in this week's Battle Zone Are you sure you want to remove this song from this week's Battle Zone? Preferred Language Upload Photos Images have to be less than 1MB in size and only of the following formats: .gif, .png or .jpg. They may not contain copyrighted images, nude or sexually explicit content, and violent or offensive material.
Please read our terms and conditions carefully because if you violate them, your account will be deleted. Discover New Artists You can access their profiles, see their exclusive photos, communicate with them and add their songs to your playlists. The best part, it is all FREE! Connect with Your Friends In Cyloop you will find old friends and meet new ones. After you create a profile in Cyloop, you will be able to: Customize your profile Communicate with friends and artists Create Blogs Collect music without limits Create and share playlists Create and share playlists Upload thousands of pictures A Tool for Artists If you are an artist, you won’t find a better tool to connect with your fans. In Cyloop you will be able to: Upload hundreds of songs Share thousands of pictures Get detailed statistics on your music Display your biography and discography Announce news and shows Meet other artists Communicate with fans Customize your profile Communicate with friends and artists Create Blogs Collect music without limits Create and share playlists Rate favorite songs Upload thousands of pictures A Tool for Artists If you are an artist, you won’t find a better tool to connect with your fans. Log Out Cyloop Music Logged in as City: created Last week's winner Vote for your favorite artists Every week you can help your favorite artist in winning a slot in the main music page of Cyloop.com. All you have to do is vote for them and their songs each week here in the Battle Zone. Tell your friends. Your favorite artists will be thankful. Time remaining for voting days hours Vote Confirm your vote for this week Type You must be logged to be able to vote Tip To select multiple songs you can use Control or Shift Keys. Then you can drag selected songs to any playlist.

Winners If you're among Pilar's most active friends, you'll get a chance to fly to Miami to work with Pilar and Rudy in the studio! We'll be selecting winners frequently, so keep visiting this page for your chance to win! Comments from Pilar Montenegro's Friends Check out this really cool promotion on Cyloop.com. You can help Pilar Montenegro and superstar producer, Rudy Perez, select the songs for her next album. The most active fan participants will be selected to join Pilar and Rudy in Miami as they create song demos for the album. Vote and Comment at www.Cyloop.com/grabaconpilar. Cyloop.com is running a really cool promotion! They teamed up with superstar producer Rudy Perez and Pilar Montenegro to create the first ever album produced by the fans. As a friend of Pilar's, you'll get the chance to say which songs will make it to her next album and which ones won't, you're the producer. And if you're among Pilar's most active friends, you'll even get a chance to fly to Miami to work with her and Rudy in the studio! Sign up today and become Pilar's friend for a chance to win a trip to Miami! From E-mail Check out this really cool promotion on Cyloop.com. You can help Pilar Montenegro and superstar producer, Rudy Perez, select the songs for her next album. The most active fan participants will be selected to join Pilar and Rudy in Miami as they create song demos for the album.
Vote and Comment at www.Cyloop.com/grabaconpilar. has invited you to join Cyloop.com and help Pilar Montenegro pick songs for her next album. Listen to these "Demo" songs and tell us which one Pilar should record and why. Register on Cyloop and ask Pilar to be your Friend. This way you'll have the opportunity to work with her on her next album. Producer Rudy Perez will grant you access to Pilar's "Demo" tracks so you can give your feedback and vote for your favorite tracks. Previous Songs Do you think that Pilar should record this song? Your comments Thank you for your comment Friend's comments has invited you to join Cyloop.com/pilar Note: If you have not received the email, please allow a few hours to receive this message. Despite best practices, POP email system may redirect new emails to junk mail, spam or deleted items folders. Please check these folders if the email is not found in your inbox. You're Almost Done! If this is not the correct address, please to contact Customer Support. Upload more than 300 songs to expose and share your music Create interactive slideshows to share photos with fans Get detailed statistics on who is viewing your profile and listening to your music Keep fans informed of upcoming concerts and shows Express yourself within your own multimedia profile and blog Invite your friends to view your profile and listen to your music Sign in above to begin the fun! Alejandro Sanz Mana Laura Pausini Luis Miguel Welcome to Cyloop! World Please write a comment before clicking on the Send button Cyloop.com is giving you the chance to show off your freestyle skills. If your song is voted as the best, you’ll win tickets to see Calle 13 in concert in New York City and an Epiphone guitar designed by world-renowned artist LEBO.
Here’s how it works: download the track and use it to record your own original freestyle "Calle 13 Style" rap; then, follow the instructions for uploading your song to your Cyloop artist profile. Make sure you enter between June 19 and 27!
Starting June 28, the contest will open up for users to cast their vote for the best freestyle rap. So be sure to tell your friends and fans to vote for you. Don’t miss out on this opportunity! Friend´s Comments I’ve entered a freestyle rap competition at Cyloop.com – you might want to enter, too! Grand prize is tickets to the Calle 13 concert in New York City and an Epiphone guitar designed by LEBO! Check it out here (www.Cyloop.com/battlerap). If you want to include an image in your message, you can paste it from another browser into the text box or upload it yourself. AEG and Calle 13 are looking for the next great Rapper on El Hood!

Add photos here. If you have photos or videos hosted in other sites you can add them to this section. We currently only support content hosted in Google, YouTube, MySpace, Slide.com and Photobucket. Please click on “Add” and copy the TAG or embed the HTML code in the box that will appear.
Every band has a story. The people want to know yours! Who's in your band? Introduce them here. If you're a managed artist, under contract or signed by a label, list your representation here. You've worked hard to create killer albums!
Promote them here. Connect with your fans and let them know what you're up to. Post the latest news, PR and happenings related to your band. Got gigs? Let people know where they can see you.
